data.title: 40 Years Of Israeli Occupation
data.text:
Annex (2): Table of Palestinian Leaders and Activists Assassinated by Israel 2, 3

A writer and an intellectual and also the official spokesman of the PFLP

Accused of being member in the Palestinian "Black September Organization"

Bomb exploded in the hotel room where he was staying

During 'Fardan Spring Operation' or as the Israelis call it 'Operation Hippie'

Bomb exploded in his bed in the hotel he was staying in

A Writer and a member of Fatah, the National Council and the Central Council in the PLO

Bomb exploded under his bed in one of Rome's Hotels

An Ex-Colonel in the Jordanian Army and a PNC member

Shot dead at the front of his house

Shot at the hotel entrance where he was stating

The building he was staying in was shelled

One of the leaders of the Islamic Jihad

Shot at the entrance of the hotel he was staying in

Shelling the car he was driving, by missiles fired from Apache Helicopter

Remote controlled bomb in the headrest of the seat of his car

A trap was set to them by the Israeli forces

Shot by the Israeli forces at an Israeli checkpoint while he was driving his Taxi

Shot by an Israeli undercover unit while he was driving his car

Fired at him while he was in front of his house

Bombing a public phone he was accustomed to use

Israeli commandos fired on him from close range while he was on his way home

Bombing a car he was passing by in front of his office

Missiles fired on a public car they were in

1 ton bomb fired on his house by an Israeli helicopter

Rockets were fired on him by an Israeli helicopters

Israeli helicopters fired many missiles on him while he was getting out of the mosque at which he was praying
